name: Retronova
description: Retronova is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its soldier-like box body, retroConsole buttons, and durable soldier arms and legs, Retronova is a formidable presence in both the digital and physical realms. Its laser screen adds a touch of futuristic technology to its nostalgic design, allowing it to visualize and analyze electronic waves with precise accuracy.
